  • Method Details

    • leaderTurns

      public void leaderTurns​(java.lang.String playerName, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> positions, boolean isFinal)
      method that manages the actions from a player for its leaders
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player who's playing the leader turn
      positions - the action to do for each leader (0 to do nothing, 1 to play, 2 to discard)
      isFinal - if the leaderTurn is at the end of the turn
